What we did Working principles

Insight #1

Software can’t solve everything

We believe...

A new software solution isn’t a magic bullet, it won’t make things better in isolation, it needs to form part of an overall plan of improvements

Because we've seen and heard...

It won’t necessarily improve people’s knowledge

It won’t necessarily solve the feeling of constant change

It won’t necessarily make people motivated to follow or buy into the process

It won’t necessarily help people manage risk better
